name: naturalway
0:
”Alexa, open natural way”
”Alexa, start natural way”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: natural way
des:
Listen to this interactive story with a timeless lesson. Identify with this little boy in this story, who realizes the prizeless work of Akiro Miyawaki, wonder o whether we ever make a difference to the planet?, invariant to the onslaught of human destruction, even reduced to a barren state, after such a humanity is long gone, nature will return to pristine in less than half a century predicts Miyawaki. Listen to this story of a little boy who sleeps for ten centuries to awaken to a renewed world, should be the agents of this restorative nature and renew the planet?
At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
